scripts.install: cd users; npm i; cd ../tasks; npm i; cd ../events; npm i;
scripts.test: cd users; npm test; cd ../tasks; npm test; cd ../events; npm test;
scripts.start: user_key=ukey user_secret=users event_key=ekey event_secret=events task_key=tkey task_secret=tasks PORT=8000 node main/server/app.js
